short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Darken grey/colourful text on web pages. No more squinting at grey fonts for those of us with bad eyesight.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Text Blackness is a Chrome extension that intelligently darkens all text on web pages. Users can customize how much blacker and to how much colour is allowed.

THIS IS A 7-DAY FREE TRIAL. AFTERWARDS PLEASE CONSIDER MAKING A ONE-TIME PURCHASE TO CONTINUE USING THIS EXTENSION.

‚≠ê FEATURES ‚≠ê
- Blacken everything
- Coloured text can be softly blackened 
- Customise how much colour to allow in web sites
- Intelligently whiten text if background were black
- Intelligently detect colourful backgrounds to decide what to do
- Adjust minimal font size without zooming in everything
- Force thin/light fonts to become normal or even bold. 
- Links can be made extra colourful to make them visually stand out
- Underline all links in web pages to improve

üîí PRIVACY üîí
Nothing is sent to us except payment information. Text Blackness operates under Swedish laws and GDPR. Please see the following for details:
